title: Take Off Your Cool
lyrics:
In this song, both Andre and Norah want their lovers to be themselves. In other words “quit frontin”.
[Intro: André 3000 & Norah Jones]
Hey, ow
Ba-do-ba, ba-do-ba
Hey, ow
Ba-do-ba, ba-do-ba
[Verse 1: Norah Jones]
Baby, take off your cool
I wanna see you, I wanna see you
Baby, don't be so cool
I wanna see you, I wanna see you
[Instrumental Break]
[Verse 2: André 3000]
Baby, take off your cool
I want to get to know you
(Baby, take off your cool)
